greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = Moebius mu(k) (n >= 1, 1<=k<=n).
comment: Row sums = Mertens sequence = A002321; right border = mu(n) = A008683. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 17 2007
M * Q as infinite lower triangular matrices; M = (1; 1, 1; 1, 1, 1;...); Q = mu(n) in the main diagonal and the rest zeros. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 17 2007
Terms in rows of this table appears to be the values of the minors in the first expansion of the determinant of the Redheffer matrix. [From _Mats Granvik_, Aug 24 2008]
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 1..125 of triangle, flattened
example: First few rows of the triangle are;
